Next Steps:
1. Launch the application from the Start Menu or Desktop
2. Select your reports folder (recommended: Documents\Reports)
3. Allow the app to run in background for syncing
4. Keep an eye on notifications for shift updates and report status

Support / Feedback:
If you face any issues or have feature requests, please contact the developer.

Thank you for installing Daily Sync System!
